RESUME 
TUONG_VIET_CHU - Java - 
For Client 
Page 1 of 8 
Senior Fullstack Engineer 
Tuong Viet Chu 
I'm a software engineer with more than 9 years of experience 
on Java language, AngularJs, Angular 5. I love to deliver 
working software written with clean code and deliver projects 
on time with high quality. I'm good both in development sites 
from scratch and in working on existing systems which need 
some improvement. I worked in all levels of development, from 
the front end to the back end, and I'm be able to work with end 
users to understand business requirements and in identifying 
new data needs and delivery mechanisms. I’m able to react 
quickly and smoothly to changes 
Skills 
• Bachelors degree (BS) in Information Technology of Natural Science HCM 
city 
• Backend: Java, Spring(SpringCore, SpringMVC, Spring Security, 
SpringData, SpringBoot, JPA, Hibernate) 
• Frontend: AngularJS/Angular 5, RequireJS, CSS3/HTML5, Flex layout, 
LESS, SASS, Bootstrap framework, jQuery, Joomla, Wordpress, can work 
with ReactJS 
• Search Engine: ElasticSearch 
• Cache: Redis 
• Scale: Mongodb, ElasticSearch 
• LoadBalancing: Nginx 
• Linux: Ubuntu, Centos, can use command-line 
• Familiarity with databases: MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB. 
• Configuration Management Tools:  Subversion, Git 
Relevant Work Experience  
Developer                                                       March 2018- Present 
ELCA VietNam 
Project: SIEL   
Project Description: 
The main features of Siel Project are manage 
person, group, document, workspace, task and 
notification. User can view and edit, search on

document on spaces, assign tasks to groups or 
specific person, receive the notification when task 
coming. 
Group are organized by multiple level tree, grant 
rights access on document, task, or person   
Tasks are manage by states , the sequences of 
state are defined and notification when each state 
changed. 
Document use Alfresco software, that is content 
and file management, through multiple open APIs, 
it is easy to integrate and extend for needs

Person and Document Management

Assignment  Duration  
11 months  
Developer                                                       Jan 2017- May 2018 
Zilla Company 
Project: Zillable.com   
Project Description: 
Zillable™ is the world’s first team collaboration 
network for innovation-on-demand, where teams 
can make work and innovation happen. As a 
secured communication and collaboration hub, 
Zillable provides an intelligent network that 
bridges minds and workflows for teams of any 
size - from 10 to 100,000. With Zillable, you can 
chat, get things done, and never forget a thing. 
For more information, visit www.zillable.com and 
try it for free! 
Page 2 of 8 
RESUME 
TUONG_VIET_CHU - Java - 
For Client 
Page 3 of 8 
Zillable helps you and your team get all of your 
work and communication into one place, 
eliminating information silos created by today’s 
“an-app-for-that” culture. By putting everything in 
one place, on one platform, and making it easier 
to share, we make collaboration - and, ultimately, 
innovation - possible. And in a world where it’s 
essential that companies continue to constantly 
innovate or risk obsoletion, that’s invaluable. 
Industry: 
Social network 
Project Team Size: 
8 
Role(s): 
Senior Front End Developer 
Skill Set Utilized: 
AnguarJS, RequireJS, Angular 5, Linux, CSS3, 
HTML5, Wordpress. 
Responsibilities: 
Develop front end (AngularJS , CSS3/HTML5, 
jQuery) for Zillable suit requirements 
Deploy the blog site of Zillable by using 
Wordpress 
Assignment  Duration  
12 months

Developer                                                       October 2010- Mark 2014 
KMS technology 
Project: HMS   
Project Description: 
- Health center system project is developed in 
java platform. Main aim of this project is to 
implement a online software application for 
maintaining drugs information, patients 
information, nurse information and doctors 
information in a single application. 
RESUME 
TUONG_VIET_CHU - Java - 
For Client 
Page 5 of 8 
- This system will reduce manual work for 
maintaining records in files. Using this system 
data is maintained in database and data retrieving 
and updating in easy process and old data can be 
easily retrieved. Doctors and patients can view 
this data from anywhere which will save time. This 
application is also useful for pharmacist to inquire 
about the drugs and update information about 
drugs to database. 
Industry: 
HealthCare System

8

Responsibilities: 
Work with team members to analyze business 
requirements analyze business requirements 
Implementing features base on requirements from 
customer

CSC Viet Nam , HCM city 
Project: RWD uLearn™   
Project Description: 
RWD uLearn™  is an e-learning system. The 
main mission of RWD uLearn™ is : enable 
organization to easily catalog learning activities 
and provide the mechanism to report on the 
progress at multiple levels. RWD uLearn™ allows

Project: Cox - iNav 
Project Description: 
Provide employees a desktop environment that 
helps them to access information and support 
tools more quickly and easily, improves the call 
handling process, creates a “virtual” service and 
support environment that allows them to offer 
customers the local “feel” from a “global” rep to 
further enhance customer service.  
Create an environment where the desktop 
transformation will be employee friendly and will 
become accepted by all employees. 
Industry: 
Call Center - Telecom

20 
Role(s):  Developer 
Skill Set Utilized: 
Windows XP, Microsoft Office, Java, JSP, 
JavaScript, Ajax, Oracle, BEA Weblogic Portal, 
Jacada Framework, Portal, Weblogic Workshop, 
Rational Rose UML, Web services 
Responsibilities: 
Implementing the modules below:Modem 
Add,Modem Swap,Search User,Implement 
IservNotes in iNav and some features in 
administrator system.These features allow the 
user interact with exist system by webservice.
